title: Japan's Prime Minister Makes Historic Address To Congress
description: Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe laid out his vision of increasing ties with the U.S., and expressed his remorse over Japan's wartime atrocities.

title: 3,600-Page Autobiographical Novel Is An Honest And Masterful 'Selfie'
description: My Struggle is about Karl Ove Knausgaard's wrangle with his father, with death, with his Muse and on. The 46-year-old Norwegian's pointedly un-literary book has become a literary sensation.

title: Welcome To The Neighborhood: 2 Super-Earths Discovered
description: Astronomers using telescopes in Hawaii and California have found two exoplanets orbiting a star a mere 54 light years away. The discovery is important for two big reasons.

title: Pope Francis Calls Gender Pay Gap A 'Pure Scandal'
description: NPR's Sylvia Poggioli reports that Francis' remarks, at his weekly general audience in St. Peter's Square, are some of his most forceful statements yet in favor of women.

title: 2016 Race Collides With Baltimore Unrest
description: Hillary Clinton told an audience in New York the criminal justice system is "out of balance" and Rand Paul attributed the violence to "the lack of a sort of moral code in our society."

title: A Short History Of The Public Radio Tote Bag
description: We discover why the tote bag has become so identified with NPR and fundraising.

title: Punch Brothers, 'Familiarity'
description: The venturesome band takes you on a journey with a three-part song performed at Boston's House of Blues.

title: Placebo Effect: It Might Not Be In Your Head After All
description: There's new evidence that what's going on with the placebo effect is more than psychological. The implications are numerous.

title: School Was Closed, But This Baltimore Dad Had An Amazing Lesson For His Son
description: "I want him to look at these photos one day and say, 'I was part of history and my Dad shared it with me.' "

title: Japanese Prime Minister Calls For Stronger U.S.-Japan Trade Pact
description: At a joint meeting of the House and Senate, Prime Minister Shinzo Abe urged lawmakers to strengthen economic and trade ties.

title: A Story Of Bipolar And A Daughter's Search For Answers
description: In the 1920s and '30s, Dr. Perry Baird was a rising star in the medical world, but his struggle with bipolar disorder hampered his life.

title: These Parents Make Lovely Lunch Bag Art. Not Everyone Is Pleased
description: Elaborately illustrated napkins. Famous paintings recreated using food. Depending on your viewpoint, these lunch projects are an expression of parental love or another salvo in the parenting wars.

title: After Riots, Baltimore Orioles To Play In Empty Stadium
description: The baseball game is closed to the public because of concerns of unrest. We speak with two sports radio hosts in Baltimore.

title: Bernie Sanders Expected To Announce Run For President
description: The Independent Vermont senator is planning to announce his candidacy for president, according to Vermont Public Radio.

title: Game Of Thrones: Saudi King Shakes Up Line Of Succession
description: King Salman has named a new heir â€” and consolidated power in the hands of a younger generation.
